meanings.definition: A person or company that builds ships.
meanings.sent1: The skilled shipbuilders constructed a massive vessel for the navy.
meanings.sent2: The shipbuilders worked tirelessly to complete the new cargo ship.
meanings.sent3: The shipbuilders decided to have a race to see who could build the fastest ship.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, shipbuilders are the architects of maritime transportation.
meanings.sent5: The shipbuilders' expertise ensured the safe voyage of every ship they built.

meanings.definition: The workers or employees who construct ships.
meanings.sent1: Many shipbuilders gathered at the dockyard to begin work on the next ship.
meanings.sent2: The shipbuilders used specialized tools to assemble the hull of the vessel.
meanings.sent3: During lunch break, the shipbuilders enjoyed sharing stories about their work at sea.
meanings.sent4: The shipbuilders' dedication was evident in the flawless construction of each ship.
meanings.sent5: Every ship launched by these skilled shipbuilders was a testament to their craftsmanship.
